subtitleNullable: Journalists who have died because of their job
descriptionNullable:
### Context

A free press is essential in a functioning democracy. But, in tyrannical governments headed by dictators or oppressive rulers, there is limited freedom for members of the press. This limitation in several countries of the news media has resulted in the murders of hundreds of news journalists trying to unveil the truth.

### Content

In this dataset  you will find the names and information of over 1,000 journalists who have sadly lost their lives on the job since 1992.


### Acknowledgements

This dataset comes from https://data.world/journalism/journalist-deaths
title: Journalist Deaths since 1992
